name: Electroom Switcher
description:
Welcome to our new amazing physics Electroom Puzzle Game! Test your engineering skills and build your own electrical circuit diagram!  Imagine that you are an electronic engineer and your goal is to turn on all light bulbs.

How to play: Follow the light and use right wires and avoid explosions, connecting an unlimited power line, battery and light bulbs. Each light bulb has its own voltage.

You have to use different types of wires:
► Wire conducting electrical current 1:1
► Wire conducting electrical current 1:2
► Wire conducting electrical current 1:4

Physics ElectroPuzzle features:
► Lots of challenging levels to complete;
► Develop your engineering and building skills;
► Improve your logical thinking;
► Power line with lots of bulbs;
► Follow the light amazing physics puzzle.

Be careful! The voltage is dangerous! Connect the power line and turn on all light bulbs, avoid explosions and become a real engineer!
